description: Returns, adds, authorizes, and removes AWS IAM roles in Atlas.

Profile.description: The profile is defined in AWS Secret manager. See [Secret Manager Profile setup](../../../examples/profile-secret.yaml).

ProjectId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

RoleId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the role.

IamAssumedRoleArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that MongoDB Cloud assumes when it accesses resources in your AWS account.

IamAwsRegion.description: Valid AWS Region in which IAM assumed role will be provisioned for cloudprovider access from Atlas

AuthorizedDate.description: Date and time when someone authorized this role for the specified cloud service provider. This parameter expresses its value in the ISO 8601 timestamp format in UTC.

CreatedDate.description: Date and time when someone created this role for the specified cloud service provider. This parameter expresses its value in the ISO 8601 timestamp format in UTC.

AtlasAWSAccountArn.description: Amazon Resource Name that identifies the Amazon Web Services (AWS) user account that MongoDB Cloud uses when it assumes the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role.

AtlasAssumedRoleExternalId.description: Unique external ID that MongoDB Cloud uses when it assumes the IAM role in your Amazon Web Services (AWS) account.
